attributes.action: Debate on the indedendance of the BBC in light of the support by labour of the Pedophile Information Exchange
attributes.additional_details: To discuss the failures in the BBC reporting on the affilliation and support given to the Pedophila Information Exchange by labour and to ascertain why the BBC has not given this story the coverage it deserves.Is this corruption at the highest levels? Is this political bias by the BBC in favour of subjects supported by labour?
